short_summary: Purchase of various commercial, non-customized, off-the-shelf electronic products, parts, components, tools, test instruments, radio frequency and microwave components
description: This contract seeks various electronic products, parts and components from 27 qualified suppliers.
full_summary:
---

### Solicitation for Electrical Hardware and Supplies

*[ Government Reference: CB-253-60995013, Solicitation Number: 30005248]**

#### Contract Details

* **Title:** N5975 - Electrical Hardware and Supplies
* **Contract Type:** Procurement of Electrical Components
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Regions of Delivery:** Nova Scotia and Canada
* **Contract Value:** N/A
* **Contract Period:** March 18, 2024, to March 29, 2024

#### Procurement Method

* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement (SA)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

#### Solicitation Conditions

* **Invited SA Holders:** The following 27 SA Holders have been invited to submit a proposal:
	1. Anixter
	2. Graybar
	3. Nedco-Rexal
	4. Wesco
	5. Lumen
	6. Eddy Group
	7. Technet
	8. Seivad
	9. Testequity
	10. Gap Wireless
	*and 17 more*
* **Proposal Submission:** Respondents must submit their proposal by the close date (March 15, 2024, at 2:00 PM ET).
* **Delivery Location:** Canadian Coast Guard - EITT Department, 1190 Westmount Road, Sydney, Nova Scotia, Canada B1R 2J6.
* **Delivery Date:** March 29, 2024.

#### Contact Information

* **Name:** Shawna Hamilton
* **Email:** shawna.hamilton@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
* **Phone:** (343) 540-6319

#### Important Notes

* This requirement is open only to qualified vendors under the Supply Arrangement (SA) series E60HN-16ELEC
* All terms and conditions of the SA apply.

### Attachments

The tender notice and associated documents are available for download from [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33183/npp-english-pr-30005248.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33183/npp-english-pr-30005248.pdf).
